data.name: Colorful
data.detailed_description:
Colorful is a hack-n-slash that combines acrobatic freeform movement with fast-paced combat. You wake up in an unknown lifeless world where strange shadow creatures have consumed its color.

Destroy the shadows to restore the color to the world while traversing a dreamlike landscape!

Each power gives you a unique way to traverse the environment. Wall run, scale large walls, grind, and slide! Move fast and strike hard!
